## IImage interface

A cross-environment interface for image objects that covers the properties supported by both DOM (as HTMLImageElement) and canvas-cleave (as NodeImage).

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface IImage 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [complete](./canvas-cleave.iimage.complete.md) | <code>boolean</code> | Is the image loaded? |
|  [height](./canvas-cleave.iimage.height.md) | <code>number</code> | The DOM display height of the image. |
|  [naturalHeight](./canvas-cleave.iimage.naturalheight.md) | <code>number</code> | The actual height of the image. |
|  [naturalWidth](./canvas-cleave.iimage.naturalwidth.md) | <code>number</code> | The actual width of the image. |
|  [src](./canvas-cleave.iimage.src.md) | <code>string</code> | The source URL of the image. |
|  [width](./canvas-cleave.iimage.width.md) | <code>number</code> | The DOM display width of the image. |

## Methods

|  Method | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [removeAttribute(attr)](./canvas-cleave.iimage.removeattribute.md) | Unset the DOM width and height parameters. |
